item.title: 00 Hellowrld
item.author: dwightaspencer@gmail.com (Dwight Spencer)
item.description: Hellowrld Reality is silly-putty. -Paul Krassner Linux is bloat, Java is a virus, Rust is a mind virus, node is crack and no one understands system design andymore. Now the old greybeards are done chasing off the PFY while screeming at clouds. We can get down to the real fun. $ ssh hack.dapla.net help Thanks to Soft Serve one can find security research whitepapers, talks and presentations, and a few easter eggs on my self hosted git repos.
